channel.title: Iconic Knights
channel.description:
[IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/1802/ikwallpaper.png[/img]
I just started this, I know it's off center, but it's 1 AM and I cant be arsed to fix it right now. C&C? I don't know what else to add to this.

item.title: Iconic Knights
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“dragonfire455, post:4, topic:271622”]I like it, looks pretty good. How long did it take you?

[quote author=sanga282 link=topic=358443.msg2736716#msg2736716 date=1239088405]
maybe the background should have more of a rusty metal texture to it i think that would probably work well
[/quote]Meh, that would make it look better.[/quote]

Ah… like 15 minutes?..

sanga282:

maybe the background should have more of a rusty metal texture to it i think that would probably work well

Good idea, I’ll do it when i get back home tomorrow

Read full topic
